statements: DELETE FROM log_data WHERE server_id = 1 AND log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM log_data WHERE log_message = 'System Error' AND server_id IN (3, 5);
DELETE FROM server_logs WHERE server_id = 100 AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 80 OR disk_usage > 90;
DELETE FROM server_logs WHERE server_name = 'Server A';
DELETE FROM server_performance WHERE server_name = 'Server B' AND performance_timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM error_logs WHERE server_id = 5 AND error_code = 404;
DELETE FROM errors WHERE error_id = 100 AND server_id = 2;
